channel.title: SaaS on Lenz Zuber
channel.description: Recent content in SaaS on Lenz Zuber

item.title: Logseq
item.description: Logseq is one of the most powerful PKM Tools out there. My blog is generated out of my fork of logseq-graph using logseq-schrodinger.
